entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS You arrogant, ignorant man. Now, we have three top doctors having to self quarantine because your vanity and stupidity has put people at risk by refusing to wear masks and self distance like the rest of us responsible Americans are doing. #coronavirus
